name: biosciences-toolkit
description: Comprehensive bioinformatics tools for sequence analysis, protein analysis, and molecular biology
long_description: This MCP server provides a complete suite of bioinformatics tools built on Biopython and other popular Python libraries. Features include DNA/RNA sequence analysis, protein characterization, sequence alignment, ORF finding, BLAST searches, and more. Perfect for genomics research, computational biology, and bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: reverse_complement
tools.description: Returns the reverse complement of a DNA or RNA sequence

tools.name: transcribe
tools.description: Transcribes a DNA sequence to RNA

tools.name: translate
tools.description: Translates a DNA or RNA sequence to protein

tools.name: gc_content
tools.description: Calculates GC content percentage of a sequence

tools.name: molecular_weight
tools.description: Calculates molecular weight of DNA, RNA, or protein

tools.name: protein_analysis
tools.description: Comprehensive protein analysis including MW, pI, instability, secondary structure

tools.name: convert_sequence_format
tools.description: Converts between sequence file formats (FASTA, GenBank, EMBL, etc.)

tools.name: find_motif
tools.description: Finds all occurrences of a motif in a sequence

tools.name: find_orfs
tools.description: Finds Open Reading Frames in a DNA sequence

tools.name: pairwise_alignment
tools.description: Performs global or local pairwise sequence alignment

tools.name: ncbi_blast_search
tools.description: Performs NCBI BLAST search for sequence similarity

tools.name: calculate_sequence_distance
tools.description: Calculates Hamming distance between two sequences
